This game was extremely fun having extremely smart, difficult, that most importantly made me want to use a guide but you shouldn't, that ruin the fun, and make you feel stupid, cause at the end of each puzzle I felt smart, and felt that I should have figured it out sooner. it makes me extremely excited to play the second portal as I got it in a bundle for cheap in the summer sale, I heavily recommend it, and it's pretty cheap too.

Este juego es muy bueno y realmente te pone a pensar, es muuuy bueno la historia es buena, los graficos son buenos, y definitivamente no es el tipico juego de disparos y matar pero aun asi es un concepto nuevo y realmente intereseantw sinceramente es de los mejores juegos que he jugado SUPER recomendado!!!
The Game is pretty short although very fun to play, would recommend!

While short, it can be a really fun game and give hard challenges and has a good story. Also screw Advanced Test Chamber 16

I was really lucky to get the game for $1.99 but, after playing, I would reccommend to buy this game even at full price. Amazing video game classic and I wished I would've played sooner. It is a short story but there are bonus levels and challenged designed for extra gameplay. Overall, I rate this game a 9.5/10 (-0.5 for [spoiler] getting emotionally attached to Companion Cube [/spoiler])

short but fun
only had to look up a tutorial like 2 maybe 3 times total and one of those was just me being an unaware dumbass and not being able to piece together what i was supposed to do

This game is perfect

It's an amazing game. All the puzzles are well made and do require you to think. All the dialogue is very funny and well written. It's like GLaDOS is talking to the player not Chell. The music fits the lonely atmosphere and is really good. If you have 3 hours to spare. Play this
i dont like thinking with portals

awesome game just wished chell can talk
I feel like splitgate has much more smooth portals? Well this is a 2007 game so... I was late but it is still fun.
Short, but worth it. Get Portal 2 for more.
